ygData.subject: Re: Survey and Females
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh - Bhuku think you cute.  Bhuku want hug you and squeeze you - bet you feel good under armor...  Take armor off - let Bhuku see. Talies
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:52 PM 10/7/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Frank Hartmann" <FRANHART@...>
>
>Here's an idea:
>
>When being stalked by an unscrupulous 16 year old, get the stalker's name
>and log out. Now log back in using your ogre female. Find the stalker and
>turn the tables on them, i.e. follow them around, make suggestive
>statements, etc. This will surely frighten them off and give them an idea of
>how their actions affect others. Don't push it too far, i.e. harassment,
>just enough to make your point. You might even role play it a bit to make it
>fun.

Heh - "Bhuku think you cute. Bhuku want hug you and squeeze you - bet you
feel good under armor... Take armor off - let Bhuku see."

Talies
